mapper.insert: insert into board values ((select nvl(max(b_no)+1,1) from board), #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_m_id}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content}, b_regdate=sysdate where b_no=#{b_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where b_m_id=#{b_m_id}
